Super Nice Game, 
I got called a Asshole by Russian Kids a lot but a really nice game overall.

First match with PRIME - cheater got live banned.
Second match with PRIME - teammates shooting at me, trolling the game.
Third match with PRIME - 2 guys left from the game on second round.
Fourth match with PRIME - Spinbotter from the enemy team.
Thanks, Valve! Really improved game so far.
